statements: SELECT * FROM medical_inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT item_name, exp_date FROM medical_inventory WHERE exp_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE location = 'Hospital A'
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, location, exp_date FROM medical_inventory
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, location, exp_date FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY exp_date DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, exp_date FROM medical_inventory WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name, location FROM medical_inventory WHERE exp_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location, item_id
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE location LIKE 'Room%' ORDER BY item_id ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM medical_inventory WHERE exp_date < '2022-10-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name, serial_number FROM robots;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM robots WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE robot_name LIKE 'R%' ORDER BY robot_id DESC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, serial_number FROM robots WHERE robot_id > 100 AND robot_id < 200 ORDER BY robot_id ASC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM supplies WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier X' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY supply_id ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE serial_number IS NOT NULL AND robot_name != 'Robot 1' ORDER BY serial_number ASC, robot_name DESC;
SELECT supply_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM supplies WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, supply_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, quantity_in_stock FROM medical_devices WHERE quantity_in_stock > 10;
SELECT manufacturer, purchase_date FROM medical_devices WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM surgical_kits WHERE sterile_status = TRUE ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT kit_name, manufacturer, last_used_date FROM surgical_kits WHERE last_used_date IS NOT NULL AND manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY last_used_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, quantity_in_stock ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM medical_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Medical';
SELECT kit_id, kit_name, expiry_date FROM surgical_kits WHERE sterile_status = TRUE OR expiry_date <= NOW();
SELECT operation_id, surgeon_name, equipment_used FROM surgical_operations WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND operation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM surgical_operations ORDER BY operation_date ASC, surgeon_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, name, type FROM equipment;
SELECT name, quantity FROM equipment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, type FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, name, type, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT id, name, type FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, category, expiration_date FROM supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date;

SELECT id, date, surgeon, equipment.name AS equipment_name, supplies.name AS supply_name FROM surgeries JOIN equipment ON surgeries.equipment_id = equipment.id JOIN supplies ON surgeries.supply_id = supplies.id WHERE surgeon = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, name, address, contact_person, phone_number FROM locations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' OR address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY name;

SELECT id, date, surgeon, equipment.name AS equipment_name, supplies.category AS supply_category FROM surgeries JOIN equipment ON surgeries.equipment_id = equipment.id JOIN supplies ON surgeries.supply_id = supplies.id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND surgeon <> 'Dr. Johnson' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT r_name, r_model FROM robots;
SELECT r_name, r_location FROM robots WHERE r_location = 'Lab';
SELECT * FROM surgeries ORDER BY s_date DESC;
SELECT t.trans_id, t.trans_type, t.trans_date, e.e_name, e.e_quantity FROM transactions t JOIN equipment e ON t.trans_id = e.e_id;
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT r_name, r_model FROM robots WHERE r_location = 'Lab';
SELECT s_date, surgeon_name FROM surgeries WHERE s_time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT e_name, e_quantity FROM equipment WHERE e_location = 'Storage' ORDER BY e_quantity DESC;
SELECT trans_date, trans_amount, trans_description FROM transactions WHERE trans_type = 'Sale' AND trans_amount > 100 ORDER BY trans_date DESC;
